Welcome to NerdWallet’s Smart Money podcast, where we answer your real-world money questions. In this episode:

Learn the pros, cons, and methods of rolling over retirement accounts to simplify your finances so you can avoid costly mistakes.

How can you budget smarter for the holidays? Does it make sense to combine retirement accounts from previous jobs into one? What are the benefits and drawbacks of different rollover options?
